name: Criminal Mastermind
description:
Criminal Master Mind is a local Real Time Tactics game for Pc where you must put your robbery skills to the test!

  •  Earn money to get new allies and play with them! 
  •  Enjoy our variety of maps 
  • Use different strategies to take the money!

 Game developed by:

    •  Arnau Tarragó  
    • Genís Domènech 
    • Victor Blas 
    • Franco Rivadeneyra
